name: Geo Wiz Applications
short_description: This project aims to develop a suite of web-based and mobile tools that will help individuals gather field data, retrieve relevant information from repositories and make informed decisions. The mobile tools will provide offline mode in which users can cache relevant information and take it to work in the field. This will allow users to work in remote areas where internet connection is slow or not available. It will also speed up processing when large amount of data is required.
summary: Mobile and web-based tools for data gather and broadcasting
